code: export var fetcher=function fetcher(){return fetch.apply(void 0,arguments).then(function(res){return res.json();});};export var apiKey="628e09f41a4b7a1f3b3c15de74faa337";var tmdbEndpoint="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie";var tmbdEnpointSearch="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie";export var tmdbAPI={getMovieList:function getMovieList(type){var page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;return"".concat(tmdbEndpoint,"/").concat(type,"?api_key=").concat(apiKey,"&page=").concat(page);},getMovieDetail:function getMovieDetail(movieId){return"".concat(tmdbEndpoint,"/").concat(movieId,"?api_key=").concat(apiKey);},getMovieMeta:function getMovieMeta(movieId,type){return"".concat(tmdbEndpoint,"/").concat(movieId,"/").concat(type,"?api_key=").concat(apiKey);},getMovieSearch:function getMovieSearch(query){var page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;return"".concat(tmbdEnpointSearch,"?api_key=").concat(apiKey,"&query=").concat(query,"&page=").concat(page);},imageOriginal:function imageOriginal(url){return"https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original/".concat(url);},image500:function image500(url){return"https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/".concat(url);}};
